description: Dear colleague letter dated 02/05/2008 from Baroness Thornton regarding various issues arising during the debate on NHS dental services on 24th April 2008. Incl. copy of letter dated 02/05/2008 from Barry Cockcroft, Chief Dental Officer, to Baroness Finlay of Llandaff regarding dental treatments. 8 p.
department: Dept of Health CHIEF DENTAL OFFICER
